invocation-schema.title: Invocation manifest for HDFT Subsampled Diffusion Reconstruction

___sh_filename.description: Output filename of 4D spherical harmonic coefficient data.

___mean_diffusion_length.description: The mean diffusion length for reconstruction of GQI matrix.

gear.author: Schneider Lab, University of Pittsburgh
gear.description: Computes a transformation of multi-shell diffusion weighted data to a set of Spherical Harmonic coefficients and outputs 4D Spherical Harmonic coefficient data. This is a first step in the Schneider Lab HDFT diffusion reconstruction process. See: Pathak, S. K., Fissell, C., Krishnaswamy, D., Aggarwal, S., Hachey, R., Schneider, W. (2015). Diffusion reconstruction by combining spherical harmonics and generalized q-sampling imaging. ISMRM, Toronto, Canada.
gear.label: HDFT Subsampled Diffusion Reconstruction
gear.name: hdft-subsampled-recon

sh_filename.description: Output filename of 4D spherical harmonic coefficient data.

mean_diffusion_length.description: The mean diffusion length for reconstruction of GQI matrix.
